CommandDefinition.Name: listorderseriesinfo
CommandDefinition.Description: Shows detailed information about the state of the Xyna Order Series Management.

BoolOption.Name: v
BoolOption.Description: Enables verbose output and shows all order ids currently residing in the order series management

BoolOption.Name: vv
BoolOption.Description: Enables verbose output and shows all order ids currently residing in the order series management and information about predecessors
